title: Mastering .NET for Cloud Development
description: A comprehensive roadmap to enhance your skills in .NET and cloud development with Azure, tailored for those seeking a career in cloud application development.
targetAudience: Developers familiar with C# aiming to specialize in .NET Cloud Development for career opportunities.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of web technologies (HTML, HTTP, REST APIs)

phases.name: .NET Fundamentals
phases.description: Understand the fundamentals of .NET, its framework, and applications it is used for.

topics.name: Introduction to .NET
topics.description: Understand the basics of .NET's components, features, and how it can be used for various applications.

projects.name: Create a Simple Console App
projects.description: Build a simple console application in .NET to display user input.

projects.name: Build a Mini Calculator App
projects.description: Develop a basic calculator for arithmetic operations.

phases.name: Introduction to ASP.NET Core
phases.description: Learn the basics of web application development using ASP.NET Core.

topics.name: Getting Started with ASP.NET Core
topics.description: Explore the features of ASP.NET Core and how to use it to build web applications.

projects.name: Build a Personal Portfolio Page
projects.description: Develop a portfolio web page using ASP.NET Core, highlighting your skills and projects.

projects.name: Create a Blog Application
projects.description: Design a blog web application where users can add, edit, and delete posts.

phases.name: Azure Cloud Fundamentals
phases.description: Gain foundational knowledge of Microsoft Azure for deploying and managing cloud applications.

topics.name: Azure Fundamentals
topics.description: Learn the basics of Azure services and how to set up an account.

projects.name: Deploy a Website on Azure
projects.description: Host your website on Azure App Services and configure it.

projects.name: Create Azure Resource Groups
projects.description: Organize and manage resources for a sample application using Azure Resource Groups.

phases.name: REST API Development with ASP.NET Core
phases.description: Learn how to build RESTful APIs using .NET and best practices for scalable systems.

topics.name: Building RESTful APIs
topics.description: Create and test APIs that adhere to REST principles using ASP.NET Core.

resources.title: Build your first web API with ASP.NET Core

projects.name: Build a Task Management API
projects.description: Develop a REST API for managing tasks using GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.

projects.name: E-commerce Backend API
projects.description: Create APIs for managing products, customers, and orders for an e-commerce application.

phases.name: Serverless Development with Azure
phases.description: Learn to create scalable and cost-efficient serverless applications using Azure Functions.

topics.name: Introduction to Azure Functions
topics.description: Dive into serverless development with Azure Functions.

projects.name: Weather Data Processing Function
projects.description: Create an Azure Function to fetch and process weather data.

projects.name: Image Processing Function
projects.description: Build an Azure Function to process and resize uploaded images.

nextSteps: Explore microservices development with .NET and Docker
Learn advanced Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Services (AKS)
Gain proficiency with DevOps by integrating Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions
